name: Lido Aurora
description: Located in the heart of Scauri bay, this was the very first bathing establishment of this area borned in the 20s. Crystal clear waters, beautiful and relaxing atmosphere, a familiar and welcoming environment awaits all the customers!
visitInfo:
Location's address: Lungomare Nazario Sauro, 04028 Minturno LT.
Always opened from 7:00 to 02:00 every day of the week, restaurant opened every day of the week: 
● From 12:30 to 15:00
● From 20:00 to 23:00
Closed from October 1rst to April 24th
Free entrance

events.name: Broncorotto Live Reggae
events.description:
A beach concert featuring the group of raggae musicians Broncotto and the DJ Mario Tomao.
Foods and drinks will be available throughout the vent, let's party all night!
events.admission:
The event will start the 26th of August at 21:00 (9 pm).
Free entry for everyone.

name: Spiaggia dei Sassolini
description: Described as a small paradisiac corner, many tourists are attracted every year to this beach. Famous thanks to the small pebbles that compose it, this is the ideal place for leaxing with your own family and friends!
visitInfo:
Location's address: Via Nino Manfredi, 04028 Minturno LT
Opened every day of the week from 08:30 to 01:00

events.name: Mare in Cantina
events.description:
A wine tasting event organized by Andrea Polidore, author of Italy's Tasted Magazine and Tasted Journal, world popular oenology magazines.
Stands will be organized in order to allow wine tasting for everyone. A careful selection of high quality wines await everyone!
events.admission:
The event will be held the 18th of July 19:00 a 22:00.
Free entrance, price for wine tasting may vary depending on the type of the wine.

name: Torre di Scauri
description:
Located on the Monte d'Oro, this historical tower was born in the XVI century with the aim of providing control and defense to the city from the pirates that infested the Mediterranean Sea.La costruzione della torre risale circa al XVI secolo.
Reaching the Tower of Scauri is a real experience immersed in the nature: it can in fact be reached on foot via a path that connects the top of Monte d'Oro, where the tower is located, to the inhabited center.
The route is very simple and suitable for families: in fact the minimum difference in height of 50 meters and the length of the path of only 600 meters allows children and adults to reach the Scauri Tower and enjoy a crazy views!
visitInfo:
Location's address: Via della Cartiera, 04028 Minturno LT.
Always accessible, free entrance

name: Parco regionale di Gianola e Monte di Scauri

images.alt: Parco regionale di Gianola e Monte di Scauri 1
Parco regionale di Gianola e Monte di Scauri 2
Parco regionale di Gianola e Monte di Scauri 3
Parco regionale di Gianola e Monte di Scauri 4
Parco regionale di Gianola e Monte di Scauri 5

description:
A must view site for all the natural enthusiasts. The protected area consists of hills near the sea from which the Monte di Scauri emerges with its 123 meters. The climate, particularly mild and of a decidedly Mediterranean type, allows pleasant visits and walks during all seasons of the year. Of particular charm is the spring period, when brooms, rock roses, heather, gladioli and other plants of the thick Mediterranean scrub, color the environments surrounding the cliffs.
Of considerable importance is the cork oak forest, where, among ancient trees and cliffs, the visitor will forget, for a few moments, that he is only a few meters from the sea.
In addition to the charm of the natural environments with paths immersed in thick vegetation, the area is embellished from numerous remains of the Roman era, a sign of intense human activity that has continued incessantly for 2000 years, up to the present day. It is certainly no coincidence that in those times man had already understood the uniqueness of these landscapes.
visitInfo:
Location's address: Via del Porticciolo Romano, Formia, LT.
Always open. Free entrance

events.name: GianoTrail
events.description:
A foot race on trails over a distance of 10 km. Organized by the Atletica Olimpic Marina in collaboration Uisp, the event represents the 33rd stop of the Slam Uips Latina competition. People can partecipate either the running or walking competition.
The event will be organized as following:
● 8:00 - meeting place at Gianola's park Eco Point
● 10:00 - Start of the running competition
● 11:00 - Start of the walking competition
● 12:00 - awards
Partecipate for personal satisfaction or cheer the competitors with your voice!
events.admission:
The event will be held the 20th of February 8:00 a 12:00 in Info-point Gianola (Via Porticciolo Romano).
A fee of 12 euros is required for partecipating. Last day for applying is the 18th of February, visit the official site for more information.

events.name: Luci and Stelle
events.description:
Performance di chitarra acustica aspettando le stelle cadenti. La sera del 5 Novembre il Parco Riviera di Ulisse attende cittadini e turisti per una visita notturna di quattro tra i suoi più significativi siti: la Torre Quadratadi Scauri a Minturno, l’area Archeologica di Gianola a Formia, Monte Orlandoa Gaeta e Torre Truglia  a Sperlonga. Gli ospiti saranno guidati alla scoperta della volta celeste nell’incantevole cornice di sentieri e bellezze storico-paesaggistiche con proiezione di documentari e musica acustica dal vivo.
L’iniziativa Tra Luci&Stelle è gratuita e realizzata in collaborazione con il Comune di Sperlonga, la LNI Sperlonga, associazioni locali e gruppi astrofili. Rientra nell’evento tematico “L’Estate delle Meraviglie” della Regione Lazio.
events.admission:
The event will be held the 10th of August 21:00-23:00 in Info-point Gianola (Via Porticciolo Romano).
Free entry for everyone.

name: Sughereta del Monte di Scauri
description:
A magnificent example of a typical Habitat present in the Mediterranean basin (very representative of Sardegna) now almost rare in peninsular Italy!
It is a very beautiful place, huge corks that are spectacular, the only drawback, we discovered it later, this area is off limits to any activity due to the presence of numerous wild boars, which could be dangerous for humans
visitInfo:
04023 Formia LT, always accessible.
Free entrance.

events.name: Aperitivo di fine stagione

images.alt: glasses of aperol spritz and finger food

events.description: The last aperitivo of the summer is a must for late tourists that wants to enjoy their stay in Minturno!
events.admission: This event allow free entrance for all. Dogs are also welcomed as long as they are on a leash!

name: Minturno War Cemetery

images.alt: lapide di un soldato caduto in guerra
lapidi di soldati caduti in guerra

description: On 3 September 1943 the Allies invaded the Italian mainland, the invasion coinciding with an armistice made with the Italians who then re-entered the war on the Allied side. Allied objectives were to draw German troops from the Russian front and more particularly from France, where an offensive was planned for the following year. Progress through southern Italy was rapid despite stiff resistance, but by the end of October, the Allies were facing the German winter defensive position known as the Gustav Line, which stretched from the river Garigliano in the west to the Sangro in the east. Initial attempts to breach the western end of the line were unsuccessful and it was not until 17 January 1944 that the Garigliano was crossed, and Minturno taken two days later. The site for the cemetery was chosen in January 1944, but the Allies then lost some ground and the site came under German small-arms fire. The cemetery could not be used again until May 1944 when the Allies launched their final advance on Rome and the US 85th and 88th Divisions were in this sector. The burials are mainly those of the heavy casualties incurred in crossing the Garigliano in January. Minturno War Cemetery contains 2,049 Commonwealth burials of the Second World War. The cemetery was designed by Louis de Soissons.
visitInfo:
The cemetery is permanently open and may be visited anytime.
 Wheelchair access to the site is possible via an alternative entrance.

events.name: Commemoration of fallen soldiers
events.description: At 2 PM we will all leave from the town hall and arrive at the cemetery, where the mayor will hand the crown to the fallen in respect.
events.admission: All citizens are invited to participate.

name: Teatro romano di Minturnae

images.alt: Vista dal basso del teatro romano

description: The Roman theatre, built in the late Republican era or at the beginning of the Empire. It incorporated a section of the ancient walls of the town which perhaps had lost their purpose. Its strong masonry structure has resisted the ravages of time and the vaults which supported the seating section today house a small museum.
visitInfo:
Opening hours: 9 AM - 4 PM
 Closed on 01 January, 01 May, 25 December
Visit time: 90 minutes 
Free entrance

events.name: End of Year High School Show
events.description: The high school of Minturno will hold a show on ancient Rome. Afterwards there will be a buffet. Do not miss it!
events.admission: The cost of the ticket is 5€ . Free entrance for students.

images.alt: basket of herbs with the name of the restaurant

events.name: Degustazione vini

images.alt: glasses of different types of wine
glasses of different types of wine

events.description: Join the fine wine's degustation of Osteria Anna!
events.admission: It is necessary to book a table in order to participate to this event.

name: Castello Baronale di Minturno
description: The Castle, west of the current center, has a trapezoidal plant and is divided into several levels, following the development of the natural conformation of the ground. It has two entrances; the first, the main one, southeast and outside the walls, near the main door of the city. The second opened internally to the walls and in the upper part of the facade are still visible traces of the loopholes for the operation of the drawbridge. From the first entrance there is access to a large hall that overlooks a porch turned to cruise. The ground floor housed the service rooms such as cellars, kitchens, stables and armoury; all these rooms overlooked a large trapezoidal courtyard.
visitInfo:
Opening hours: 8 AM - 6 PM
 Closed on 25 December

events.name: Classical music concert
events.description: The concert will begin at 6 PM. Why participate? Well, hearing classical music in a concert can leave you feeling refreshed and energized. It can be fun. It can be romantic. It can be spiritual.
events.admission: The cost of the ticket is 20€ . No pets allowed

name: Monumento ai Caduti
description: During the last World War, the city and its countryside, located near the Gustav Line, were the scene of hard battles and violent bombing that caused many victims and extensive damage. Citizens, defenceless and exhausted by privations, were passed through the arms of the retaliation of the retreating German army, countless were the examples of love for the homeland and of noble spirit of sacrifice.
visitInfo: The monument is in the central square of Minturno and can always be visited.

name: Castrum argenti
description: Castrum Argenti is a site of historical and naturalistic value, on the promontory of Monte d'Argento, in Marina di Minturno. According to the sources, it hosted the meeting that led to the drafting of the Placitum of Castrum Argenti, with which the disputes concerning the definition of the boundaries between the Duchy of Traetto (now Minturno) and the Terra Sancti Benedicti, governed by the Abbey of Montecassino, were resolved. It is one of the few protohistoric sites of Lazio, in which there are also Roman materials. The findings would testify to the existence on the site of an important coastal settlement of the early Iron Age.
visitInfo: Castrum argenti can always be visited.

name: Pesce, Amore e Fantasia
description: Delicious plates from the Minturno's sea!

name: Silvia Bistrot
description: Little heart-warming bistrot in the center of Minturno.

name: Agriturismo a casa di Don Peppe

events.name: Pranzo degli animali
events.description: Join a tour of the farm and meet all the animals. The food to feed them will be provided to visitors!
events.admission: In order to be admitted to this event it is mandatory to purchase an insurance against donkeys' bites. Find more about it at the reception.
